text:
I am new in HubSpot and learning how to edit files.
Is there anyone who can help me how to edit search file module or create child theme so I can test my JS code.
Right now I opened the parent theme and it said you can't edit this file.

Hey <@U07JWP414P2>,
if you're trying to edit a marketplace or HubSpot theme - it's not possible.

Here's <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/cms/content/themes/child-themes#child-themes|the doc about child-themes.>

And if you're just getting started - I highly advise you to complete the <https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/cms-for-developers|CMS for developers> certification in the academy
Hello, what happens if I change the theme while creating a landing page? Can I use any theme to build a landing page?
Yes, you can swap themes for different LPs, but you would most likely want to start from scratch with the new LP and different theme rather than changing it after you create it.
